name: Brush Em All
description:
A Game made by Red Scale Studio using Unity3D.
The game was made in one week!

the game genre chosen randomly plus one particularity that being minimalist!

Controls.

WASD - move the character.

E - melee attack.

Left Click - draw bullets.

Right Click - release the bullets.

1 to 3 and Mouse Scroll - change brush color.

Made by.

GD - https://lontramarota.itch.io/
Programmer - https://darkfail.itch.io/
